mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and purple on white) announcing the Oxford Double Decker Festival featuring Caroline Herring, Duff Dorrough and the Revelators, Will Kimbrough, Holmes Brothers, Del McCourry Band, Kudzu Kings, Mighty Stars of Harmony, Claire Holley, Jerry Joseph and the Jackmormons, Wild Magnolias, Will Hoge, Big Star, and Nanci Griffith in Oxford, Mississippi on April 27. Poster features woodcuts of stars and circus tents.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
